name: RawGestureDetector
desc: A widget that detects gestures described by the given gesture factories.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget below this widget in the tree.

fields.name: gestures
fields.desc: The gestures that this widget will attempt to recognize.

fields.name: behavior
fields.desc: How this gesture detector should behave during hit testing.

fields.name: excludeFromSemantics
fields.desc: Whether to exclude these gestures from the semantics tree. For example, the long-press gesture for showing a tooltip is excluded because the tooltip itself is included in the semantics tree directly and so having a gesture to show it would result in duplication of information.

fields.name: semantics
fields.desc: Describes the semantics notations that should be added to the underlying render object [RenderSemanticsGestureHandler].
